findings_summary: No evidence of distant metastatic disease. Primary tumor right breast measuring 2.6cm with suspicious right axillary lymphadenopathy (largest node 1.2cm, suspicious morphology). Liver, lungs, bones unremarkable.
Primary tumor left breast upper outer quadrant measuring 3.3cm. Multiple suspicious left axillary lymph nodes (largest 1.8cm). No definite distant metastases. Liver, lungs, bones unremarkable.
Irregular spiculated mass left breast 10 o'clock position measuring approximately 3.0cm. Architectural distortion. BI-RADS 5 - highly suspicious for malignancy. Recommend tissue diagnosis.

[PRELIMINARY - NOT FOR CLINICAL USE] Right breast irregular enhancing mass 2 o'clock position measuring 3.9 x 3.6 x 3.4cm with associated non-mass enhancement. Suspicious right axillary lymph node. Left breast unremarkable. PENDING FINAL REVIEW AND ATTENDING SIGNATURE.
Primary tumor right breast measuring approximately 3.8cm. No definite distant metastases identified. Liver, lungs, bones unremarkable.
Small tumor left breast 1.6cm. No lymphadenopathy. No distant metastases. Stage I disease.
